Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
glasses \glasses\ n. pl. Same as {eyeglasses}. See {eyeglass}[1].
Syn: spectacles, specs, eyeglasses. [WordNet 1.5]
glasses n : optical instrument consisting of a pair of lenses for correcting defective vision [syn: {spectacles}, {specs}, {eyeglasses}]
